img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game, showing an action scene where a character is engaged in combat with an enemy. The character, wielding a weapon with a glowing orange effect, is attacking an opponent who is emitting a green mist. The health bar at the bottom of the screen indicates the enemy's name as "Guangmou." Various game interface elements are visible, including health and stamina bars, potion icons on the left, and additional ability icons on the right. The environment is an outdoor setting with grass and rocks.
